name: Lockdown (Flame Flicker Interactive)
description:
"LOCKDOWN"

Lockdown is an isometric game, set in the futuristic dystopian Republic of Dimaren during an epidemic of the H84 virus. The main character James F. Rando is a Special Forces agent, whose task it is to escort vaccines for said virus to Dimaren’s capital – Gallyck. His task is interrupted by a rebellious group – The Freedom Fighters, who blow up all of the trucks containing the vaccines. James ends up being the only surviving man in his unit, and with the help of his supervisor on the radio, he somehow has to save the vaccines before the rebels destroy them!

The game is downloadable for free. To play the game, download all files. Unzip them. Then open the folder and click the file with the syringe icon. The game should start and you should see the main screen.
